EmailTemplate.name: 2018 - Singapore Airshow.2018_Event_SavetheDate_SingaporeAirshow_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Schedule a Meeting Today and Receive a Complimentary Pass for Singapore Airshow 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SINGAPORE AIRSHOW 2018 Please join us... Date 6-11th Feb., 2018
Location Honeywell Booth: Main Hall - Q23 Chalet - CS32
Honeywell Aerospace is excited once again to attend the Singapore Airshow.
Our leadership team would like to meet with valued customers like you. They welcome the opportunity to discuss industry trends, development and production programs, as well as relevant technology collaboration.
Please provide a convenient date and time to coordinate a meeting by contacting your local sales team or contact one of our event staff: Irene.loh@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Irene.loh@Honeywell.com]]> Qi.Wang7@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Qi.Wang7@Honeywell.com]]> Shamoon.Shabudin@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Shamoon.Shabudin@Honeywell.com]]>
We look forward to seeing you in there.
Schedule a meeting with our leadership team today and receive a *complimentary pass! (*first 80 customers only.)
REQUEST A MEETING <[[mailto:Irene.loh@Honeywell.com; Shamoon.Shabudin@Honeywell.com]]>
